## Consolidated Raw Snapshots

This page displays the consolidated raw data from all monitored trial snapshots. This includes all fields from ClinicalTrials.gov in a flattened format.

[Download Full Snapshots (CSV)](data/all_trials_raw.csv)

::: {.full-data-container}

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
import pandas as pd
from IPython.display import Markdown
from tabulate import tabulate
import os

csv_path = "data/all_trials_raw.csv"

if os.path.exists(csv_path):
    # Reading only the first 100 rows if it's too large for the browser
    df = pd.read_csv(csv_path)
    # Replacing NaN with empty string
    df = df.fillna('')
    
    # Truncate long cells to 100 characters to speed up rendering
    def truncate_cell(val):
        s = str(val)
        return s[:100] + "..." if len(s) > 100 else s
    
    df = df.applymap(truncate_cell)
    
    # Using tabulate for a nice markdown table
    print(tabulate(df, headers='keys', tablefmt='pipe', showindex=False))
else:
    print("No data available. Please run the monitoring script first.")
```
